/* eslint-disable template-curly-spacing */
 
import {css} from "emotion";
 
// import {unitMath,applyUnitIfRequired} from "../../../utils/css-utils";
import styleMemoize from "../../../utils/style-memoize";
import flaggedStyles,{generateStyleFlags} from "../../../utils/flagged-styles";
// import {unitMath} from "../../utils/css-utils";
import getMenuVars from "../menu/menu.var";
import menuStyle from "../menu/menu.style";
 
export default styleMemoize(function(flags = [],variation) {
 
  const menuVars = getMenuVars();
  
  const {
    fontSize,
    listviewItemVerticalPadding,
    listviewItemHorizontalPadding,
    lineHeight,
  } = menuVars;
 
  return flaggedStyles("listview",flags,{
 
    _: ()=>(css`
      ${menuStyle(generateStyleFlags(flags,["vertical"]),variation)}
      width:auto;
 
      .item {
        padding:0;
        line-height: ${lineHeight};
        overflow:hidden;
      }
 
    `),
 
    flush: ()=>(css`
 
      border-radius: 0;
      box-shadow: none;
      font-size: ${fontSize};
      margin-top: -${listviewItemVerticalPadding};
      margin-bottom: -${listviewItemVerticalPadding};
      margin-left: -${listviewItemHorizontalPadding};
      margin-right: -${listviewItemHorizontalPadding};
 
    `),
 
  });
 
});
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Jan 14 2019 21:24:09 GMT+0000 (GMT)
